mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mini_market_qna_comment_company( qna_board_company_no, qna_comment_company, qna_comment_company_date, admin_id ) VALUE( #{qnaBoardCompanyNo}, #{qnaCommentCompany}, NOW(), #{adminId} )
mapper.select: SELECT qna_comment_company_no AS qnaCommentCompanyNo, qna_board_company_no AS qnaBoardCompanyNo, qna_comment_company AS qnaCommentCompany, qna_comment_company_date AS qnaCommentCompanyDate, admin_id AS adminId FROM mini_market_qna_comment_company WHERE qna_board_company_no = #{qnaBoardCompanyNo} ORDER BY qna_comment_company_date DESC LIMIT #{beginRow} , #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mini_market_qna_comment_company WHERE qna_comment_company_no = ${qnaCommentCompanyNo}
